codes.code: argmax 'Fill in the ~ based on what you know about the context of the sentence. This quiz is in Latin. Provide the answer only. 1. \'Lauda|nd|us -a -um\' est ~, quod est adiectīvum prīmae et secundae dēclīnātiōnis. Choose from this set of possible answers [ gerundīvum, ndus ndus endus endus, enda est] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-001' where ANSWER in [ 'gerundīvum', 'ndus ndus endus endus', 'enda est']

argmax 'Fill in the ~ based on what you know about the context of the sentence. This quiz is in Latin. Provide the answer only. 2. Gerundīvum (nōm. sing. masc.) dēsinit in -nd|us [1, 2] aut -end|us [3, 4], quod ad thema praesentis adicitur: lauda|~, mone|~, leg|~, audi|~. Choose from this set of possible answers [ gerundīvum, ndus ndus endus endus, enda est] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-001' where ANSWER in [ 'gerundīvum', 'ndus ndus endus endus', 'enda est']

argmax 'Fill in the ~ based on what you know about the context of the sentence. This quiz is in Latin. Provide the answer only. 3. Gerundīvum cum verbō \'esse\' coniūnctum significat id quod fierī oportet: epistula scrīb~ ~ = epistulam scrībī oportet. Choose from this set of possible answers [ gerundīvum, ndus ndus endus endus, enda est] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-davinci-001' where ANSWER in [ 'gerundīvum', 'ndus ndus endus endus', 'enda est']
